Section.title: Package Selection
Section.Paragraph: The northpike package is divided into separate components.
If you wish to run a server that will orchestrate tasks, proceed to the server installation section.
If you wish to run an agent that will receive tasks from an existing server, proceed to the agent installation section.
If you wish to interact with an existing server from the command-line, proceed to the shell installation section.
Additionally, there is an informal setup tutorial.
